before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"972bt","text":"We strongly recommend wearing gloves and using nuclease-free tubes and reagents to avoid RNase contamination. Further recommendations for avoiding ribonuclease contamination can be found here: https://www.neb.com/tools-and-resources/usage-guidelines/avoiding-ribonuclease-contamination","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":193,"length":92}],"data":{}},{"key":"bv09t","text":"Transfection conditions may be highly variable.  It is recommended to optimize your conditions for each cell type and Cas9 target you may have.  This protocol follows conditions that have been optimized for a particular target and use of HEK293 cells.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fu6no","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"57d8t","text":"Seed the cells so that they will be around 70-90% confluent on the day of transfection.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":87},{"style":"italic","offset":43,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"F3253BE739C1410A9C83F4292D50F0AA","url":"https://www.neb.com/tools-and-resources/usage-guidelines/avoiding-ribonuclease-contamination"}}}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"a4o2c","text":"Cas9 nuclease may be used in vivo to create targeted genome modifications.  There are several ways in which to introduce Cas9-guide RNA complexes into cells.  Here we present a method for the transfection of Cas9 RNP’s into HEK293 FT cells using Thermo Fisher Lipofectamine® RNAiMAX.  This is a ‘reverse transfection’ method that uses a final concentration of 10 nM RNP per transfection in a 96-well culture plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":26,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

materials.name: EnGen Cas9 NLS, S. pyogenes - 400 pmol
EnGen sgRNA Synthesis Kit, S. pyogenes - 20 rxns
DMEM, low glucose, GlutaMAX™ Supplement, pyruvate

{"blocks":[{"key":"eq0eg","text":"Form the liposome complexes as follows below.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ip3a","text":"   Component Single Reaction x3.3 (triplicates)   RNP (120 nM) 12.5 µl 41.25 µl   RNAiMAX 1.2 µl 3.96 µl     11.3 µl 37.29 µl     12.5 µl 82.5 µl   ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":3,"length":9},{"style":"bold","offset":13,"length":15},{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":148}],"data":{}},{"key":"3uhl2","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"","data":{"cellsMeta":{"A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"A_5":{"className":"_dt-italic"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"C_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":[129,165,"158"],"data":[["\u003cstrong\u003eComponent\u003c/strong\u003e","\u003cstrong\u003eSingle Reaction\u003c/strong\u003e","\u003cstrong\u003ex3.3 (triplicates)\u003c/strong\u003e"],["RNP (120 nM)","12.5 µl","41.25 µl"],["RNAiMAX","1.2 µl","3.96 µl"],["Optimem","11.3 µl","37.29 µl"],["Total","12.5 µl","82.5 µl"]],"guid":"3D3E5140B72411E88916D1DB482D0BED","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["\u003cstrong\u003eComponent\u003c/strong\u003e","\u003cstrong\u003eSingle Reaction\u003c/strong\u003e","\u003cstrong\u003ex3.3 (triplicates)\u003c/strong\u003e"],["RNP (120 nM)","12.5 µl","41.25 µl"],["RNAiMAX","1.2 µl","3.96 µl"],["Optimem","11.3 µl","37.29 µl"],["Total","12.5 µl","82.5 µl"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23],"show_headers":true}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ctfdu","text":"You can make a master mix of the RNAiMAX and Optimem and add this directly to the RNP tube from above.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9r4e4","text":"During the RNP/liposome incubation, trypsinize the cells, washing once to remove any traces of trypsin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ca0dq","text":"Resuspend the cells in   of media and count.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":23,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"075276C08F6011ECA00F8BE6A4BC80CC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7nscp","text":"Calculate the dilution and volume needed to get the cells to 3.2 x 105 cells per ml.  You will need   of cells per well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":69,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":100,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"125","guid":"BABA1B40B0A611EAAB42216613CCC6FB","id":0,"label":"","unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7tlfn","text":"From each tube of RNP/liposome complex, aliquot   into 3 wells of a 96-well plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":48,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"25","guid":"D183D8C0B0A611EAAB42216613CCC6FB","id":0,"label":"","unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"appua","text":"Add   (3.2 x 105 cells/ml) to each well containing RNP/liposome complex and pipette up and down gently a few times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":15,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"125","guid":"FF3B2F70B0A611EAAB42216613CCC6FB","id":0,"label":"cells","unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cfjsd","text":"Incubate the cells in a humidified  , 5% CO2 incubator for 48-72 hours.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":43,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":35,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"086B53E0B0A711EAAB42216613CCC6FB","id":0,"label":"","temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}
